Class Trade

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.yunita.tradiogc.trade.Trade

extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines a trade.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns the printing format for the trade statuses.

        The format of the trade records are:

        Offered: [borrower] offered a trade for [owner's item]

        Completed: Trade for [owner's item] is completed.

        Accepted: [owner] accepted your trade for [owner's item]

        Pending: Trade for [owner's item] is pending.

        Declined: [owner] declined your trade for [owner's item]

        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        String containing borrower/owner, the items in the trade, and the status
